name: q
description:
q/k4 Language Support (kx.com). Features:
  • Syntax highlighting
  • Navigate to declaration
  • Code completion
  • Find usages
  • Rename refactoring
  • File structure
  • Go to symbol
  • Color settings
  • Code folding
notes:
1.28
  • 2021+ Intellij support
1.27
  • 2020.3 Intellij support
1.26
  • 2020.2 Intellij support
1.25
  • Support for all JetBrains IDEs (#56)
  • Support for custom authentication drivers
  • Fixes grayed-out columns within KSQL templates
1.24
  • Grays out unused variables
  • Error message when function has more than 8 params
  • Error message when function has duplicated params
1.23
  • 2020.1 Intellij support
1.22
  • Find Usages Improvements & Rename Refactoring:
  • - Locally-defined globals support
  • - Multiple declarations support
  • - Up-to-date references after undo/redo actions (#29)
  • Structure View is now always in sync (#43)
1.21
  • 2019.3 Intellij support
1.20
  • New option to evaluate current line
1.19
  • Find Usages now works across modules
1.18
  • New "Test Connection" option
1.17
  • NEW `Evaluate Selection` & `Redefine Function` actions through right-click menu and Structure View
1.16
  • Intellij 2019.2 support
1.15
  • New plugin icons
1.14
  • Intellij 2018.1-2019.1 support
1.13
  • Function parameter hints
  • Visibility and types toggles/filters in structure view
  • Configurable patterns to mark identifiers as private (Settings)
1.12
  • Symbolic references (find/usages/rename) support
  • New/better icons show up during suggestions/completion
1.9
  • Fixes/supports path symbols
  • Ignores spellchecking for ids
  • Add icons to structure view
1.8
  • Ignores non-significant whitespace after control flow keywords (#28)
  • Displays unique autocomplete suggestions (#30)
  • Enables spellchecking in lang literals & comments (#31)
1.7
  • Minor bug fixes
1.6
  • Support for rainbow highlighting (for local variables)
  • Support for viewing inline documentation
  • Fixes issue #25 (Find usages after rename)
1.5
  • Improved lexing of date/time and float values
  • Improved lexing of identifiers
1.4
  • More highlighting flexibility
  • Code folding improvements
1.3
  • Fixes `[0-6]:` adverb composition
1.2
  • Fixes whitespace handling of indented lines
1.1
  • Fixes NPE in folding code
  • Removes k3 system fns tokens
1.0
  • Drops k3 to better support q/k4 syntax
  • Renames plugin (k -> q)
  • Code folding
  • Better `enter` handling between braces/brackets/parens
0.9.8
  • Fixes NPE in completion (issue #13)
  • New highlighting for primitive verbs
  • Commenter now uses double slash (instead of single slash)
0.9.7
  • Fixes resolution of references when implicit lambda params are used
  • Fixes syntax error for commands (e.g. \l) using paths
0.9.6
  • Enables completion of cross-file var/fns in default namespace
  • Fixes k.png icon lookup on some Intellij versions
0.9.5
  • MIT license
  • Maintenance release
0.9.3
  • Fixes lexer bug with namespace declarations
0.9.2
  • k4/q partial block comments support
  • Fixes NPE on windows while resolving references
  • Other small fixes
0.9.0
  • New, more flexible grammar. Supports k3,k4 and q
  • New unit tests for completion, references, renaming & parsing
0.8.1
  • Fixes NPE
0.8
  • q support
  • Structure View
  • Auto-complete
  • Find usages
0.3
  • Small grammar fixes
0.2
  • Basic Function Completion
  • Basic Function Rename
  • Basic Go to Symbol
  • Basic Search Everywhere
0.1
  • Syntax Highlighting
  • Braces/Brackets/Parens Matching
  • Customizable Color Settings
  • Line Comments
